name: MonsterTerritory
description:
MonsterTerritory is a click adventure game.
It plays like a mathematical puzzle.
A level is divided into many areas. Each area has several monsters and some loots. You must kill the monsters in an areas before taking the loots.
Different loots add different attributes. So You need to think which loot to take first and consider the strength of monsters. You should find the correct order to clean up areas.
You should assign attribute points reasonably.
Eat specific food At the right time.
Cauculate your and enemy's Attack,Defence and Health before battle.
Need lots of S/L
